name: Trippy Escape: Mindeater
description:
Look at the world through the eyes of our main character - Cordelia. Your goal is to escape her own mind. To do that, you need to solve puzzles, collect items and use them correctly. How long will it take you to get out of the Cordelia's brain-trap?

Game features:
- Unique atmosphere
- Original design
- Brain teasing puzzles
- Fun for long winter evenings

How to play:
- Use arrows to move inside the room
- Collect and interact with items by tapping
- Tap on item in your inventory (you can see selected item in the inventory preview) and click on screen to use it
- You you get stuck, in game is a link to complete walkthrough which will help you with the hard parts

Visit our website https://koopastudio.cz a follow us on Instagram @_koopastudio_
